entries.name: new(period=60)
entries.desc: Creates a new TupleSpace.  period is used to control how often to look for dead tuples after modifications to the TupleSpace.

entries.name: notify(event, tuple, sec=nil)
entries.desc: Registers for notifications of event.  Returns a NotifyTemplateEntry. See NotifyTemplateEntry for examples of how to listen for notifications.

entries.name: read(tuple, sec=nil)
entries.desc: Reads tuple, but does not remove it.

entries.name: read_all(tuple)
entries.desc: Returns all tuples matching tuple.  Does not remove the found tuples.
